
% See https://tex.stackexchange.com/questions/68652/logo-situated-only-on-titlepage-of-beamer-presentation

% It assumes that you have two images
%  `mi.png`, the logo of Xiaomi
%            it can be downloaded from https://kpan.mioffice.cn/webfolder/ext/AhcszYVBHlA%40
%            I have extracted it and resized it to 512x512
%
%  mitc-text.png
%    It can be downloaded from https://xiaomi.f.mioffice.cn/docs/dock4fUxUEKwrD85j2IXjvFRPIg

\makeatletter
\setbeamertemplate{title page}
{
  \vspace{-0.1cm}
  \hfill\includegraphics[width=.05\textwidth]{mi.png}\hspace{0.2cm}
  \vbox{}
  \vfill
  \begin{centering}
    \begin{beamercolorbox}[sep=0pt,center]{title}
\iffalse
      % enable it to place the logo image of MITC on the title page
      {\usebeamercolor[fg]{titlegraphic}\inserttitlegraphic\par}
\fi
      \usebeamerfont{title}\inserttitle\par%
      \vskip0.25em%
      \ifx\insertsubtitle\@empty%
      \else%
        \vskip0.25em%
        {\usebeamerfont{subtitle}\usebeamercolor[fg]{subtitle}\insertsubtitle\par}%
      \fi%
    \end{beamercolorbox}%
    \vskip1em\par
    \begin{beamercolorbox}[sep=0pt,center]{author}
      \usebeamerfont{author}\insertauthor
    \end{beamercolorbox}
    \begin{beamercolorbox}[sep=0pt,center]{institute}
      \usebeamerfont{institute}\insertinstitute
    \end{beamercolorbox}
    \begin{beamercolorbox}[sep=8pt,center]{date}
      \usebeamerfont{date}\insertdate
    \end{beamercolorbox}\vskip0.5em
\iffalse
    \begin{centering}
      \begin{figure}
        \includegraphics[width=.15\textwidth]{mitc-text.png}
      \end{figure}
    \end{centering}
    \vfill
\fi
  \end{centering}
  \vfill
}
\makeatother
